info.title: Expense Tracker API
info.description: RESTful API for managing personal expenses, tracking spending by categories, and monitoring monthly budgets.

get.description: Retrieve all categories (default + user's custom categories)

put.description: Update a custom category (cannot update default categories)

delete.description: Delete a custom category (cannot delete default categories or categories with expenses)

get.description: Get comprehensive dashboard overview including income, expenses, balance, and category breakdown
Get spending trends over time (monthly, weekly, or yearly)
Get expenses breakdown by category for a specific month
Retrieve expenses with filtering, search, and pagination
Get total expenses and category breakdown for a specific month
Export expenses to CSV file with optional filtering
Export expenses to PDF file (not yet implemented)
Export expenses to Excel file (not yet implemented)
Retrieve user's export history with pagination
Retrieve all income records for the authenticated user
Retrieve the currently active income record
Get user settings, profile information, and preferences

post.description: Change user password (all tokens will be revoked)

sanctum.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}

tags.name: Income
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing monthly income

tags.description: API Endpoints for managing expense categories

tags.description: API Endpoints for dashboard statistics and analytics
